name: Winter Gold
overview: Jump, twist, tuck, flip, turn, kick and ski your way to victory in six world-class, winter sporting events! Go for record-breaking times in the Downhill, Luge and Bobsled events. Soar to ridiculous distances of the Ski Jump and amaze the judges with extreme combos in the Aerial and Snowboarding competitions! The eye-poppin' 3D, polygon graphics really make you feel like you're in the game. We've even tossed in our famous ACM (Advanced Computer Modelling) graphics to create the realistic athletes you compete with. Mix killer graphics and great play control with an intense soundtrack and you've iced the recipe for a seriously cool game!
